verses.text: God, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* rejected \w us|strong="H5921"\w*. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* broken \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H5921"\w*. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* been angry. Restore \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w again|strong="H3925"\w*.

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H8147"\w* \w made|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* land tremble. \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H8147"\w* torn \w it|strong="H7725"\w*. Mend \w its|strong="H7725"\w* fractures, \w for|strong="H8147"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* quakes.

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* have shown \w your|strong="H7725"\w* people hard things. \w You|strong="H7725"\w* have \w made|strong="H6555"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* drink \w the|strong="H7725"\w* wine \w that|strong="H7725"\w* makes \w us|strong="H7725"\w* stagger.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* given \w a|strong="H3068"\w* banner \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* may \w be|strong="H3588"\w* displayed \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H7667"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* truth. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w So|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* beloved \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* delivered, save \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* right hand, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* answer \w us|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H5414"\w* spoken \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* sanctuary: “\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* triumph. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w divide|strong="H5414"\w* Shechem, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* measure \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* valley \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Succoth.

Gilead \w is|strong="H3225"\w* mine, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* Manasseh \w is|strong="H3225"\w* mine. Ephraim also \w is|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H3467"\w* defence \w of|strong="H3225"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* head. Judah \w is|strong="H3225"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* sceptre.

Moab \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* wash basin. I will throw \w my|strong="H1696"\w* sandal \w on|strong="H1696"\w* Edom. I shout \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w triumph|strong="H5937"\w* over Philistia.”

\w Who|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* bring me \w into|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H4519"\w* \w strong|strong="H4581"\w* city? \w Who|strong="H3063"\w* \w has|strong="H3063"\w* led me \w to|strong="H3063"\w* Edom?
Haven’t \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, God, rejected \w us|strong="H5921"\w*? \w You|strong="H5921"\w* don’t go \w out|strong="H7993"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* armies, God.
Give us help \w against|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* adversary, \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* help \w of|strong="H5892"\w* man \w is|strong="H4310"\w* vain.

\w Through|strong="H3318"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H6635"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* valiantly, \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H6635"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H6635"\w* \w will|strong="H6635"\w* tread down \w our|strong="H3318"\w* adversaries.
